title: 30 Best Gifts for Men: From Music Merch to Electronics, Here’s What to Shop During Black Friday
summary: Sleigh bells will be ringing soon, and it's time to shower the man in your life with love.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The countdown to the holidays is officially on. Not sure what to get the man in your life for Christmas? Billboard ‘s got you covered. We’ve compiled a list of thoughtful and affordable holiday gifts for men that are available at Amazon, Walmart, Target, Nike and other retailers that offer fast delivery in time for the holidays. If you want to get a leg up on the Christmas shopping, there are plenty of great Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals to save big during gifting season. From tech-savvy electronics to music merch, there’s plenty of thoughtful gifts for him receiving major price slashes for the holidays.
